The /projects/collaboration/update API accepts requests in the following format:

UpdateCollaboratorRequest Model - Request to update an existing collaborator on a project.
projectId integer
required
Id of the project the collaborator is on.
collaboratorUserId string
required
User Id of the collaborator to update.
liveControl boolean
required
Gives the right to deploy and stop live algorithms.
write boolean
required
Gives the right to edit the code.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "collaboratorUserId": "string",
  "liveControl": true,
  "write": true
}
